Bandit.Name: Bandit
Bandit.Description: A human bandit is a member of a group of criminals who prey on the weak and defenseless. They are typically armed with simple weapons and armor, and they are not particularly skilled in combat.

Goblin.Name: Goblin
Goblin.Description: A goblin is a small, humanoid creature that is often associated with evil. They are typically cowardly and treacherous, but they can be fierce fighters when cornered.

Orc.Name: Orc
Orc.Description: An orc is a large, brutish humanoid creature that is often associated with violence and destruction. They are typically strong and aggressive, and they are skilled in combat.

Troll.Name: Troll
Troll.Description: A troll is a large, hulking humanoid creature that is often associated with evil. They are typically strong and aggressive, and they are immune to fire and poison damage.

Animated Armor.Name: Animated Armor
Animated Armor.Description: An animated armor is a suit of armor that has been brought to life by magic. It is typically used as a guard or a servant, and it is not particularly intelligent or dangerous.

Ankheg.Name: Ankheg
Ankheg.Description: An ankheg is a large, burrowing creature that is often found in underground tunnels and caverns. It has a powerful bite that can crush bone, and it can also inject its prey with a paralyzing venom.

Apprentice Wizard.Name: Apprentice Wizard
Apprentice Wizard.Description: An apprentice wizard is a young wizard who is still learning the ways of magic. They are typically not very powerful, but they can be dangerous if they are underestimated.

Armored Wight.Name: Armored Wight
Armored Wight.Description: An armored wight is a undead creature that has been reanimated by magic. It is typically wearing heavy armor and wielding a powerful weapon, and it is a dangerous foe.

Beholder.Name: Beholder
Beholder.Description: A beholder is a large, floating creature with a central eye surrounded by 10 eyestalks. Each eye has a different magical ability, and the beholder can use these abilities to attack its foes.

Chain Devil.Name: Chain Devil
Chain Devil.Description: A chain devil is a fiendish creature that is bound to a magical chain. It is typically cruel and sadistic, and it enjoys torturing its victims.

Chimera.Name: Chimera
Chimera.Description: A chimera is a three-headed creature that is often associated with fire and destruction. It has the head of a lion, a goat, and a snake, and it can breathe fire.

Displacer Beast.Name: Displacer Beast
Displacer Beast.Description: A displacer beast is a large, feline creature that is often found in forests and jungles. It has the ability to create a magical illusion that makes it appear to be in two places at once, making it difficult to hit.

Drow.Name: Drow
Drow.Description: A drow is a dark elf that lives in the Underdark. They are typically cruel and sadistic, and they worship the dark goddess Lolth.

Ettin.Name: Ettin
Ettin.Description: An ettin is a giant with two heads. It is typically strong and aggressive, and it is skilled in combat.

Gelatinous Cube.Name: Gelatinous Cube
Gelatinous Cube.Description: A gelatinous cube is a large, amorphous creature that is often found in dungeons and caves. It is made of a thick, gelatinous substance that can dissolve flesh and bone.

Giant Spider.Name: Giant Spider
Giant Spider.Description: A giant spider is a large, venomous creature that is often found in forests and jungles. It has eight legs and a venomous bite that can paralyze its prey.

Goblin Boss.Name: Goblin Boss
Goblin Boss.Description: A goblin boss is a larger and more powerful goblin than a normal goblin. It is typically armed with a better weapon and armor, and it has more hit points.

Griffin.Name: Griffin
Griffin.Description: A griffin is a large, winged creature that is often found in mountains and forests. It has the body of a lion and the head and wings of an eagle.

Grick.Name: Grick
Grick.Description: A grick is a large, reptilian creature that is often found in dungeons and caves. It has sharp claws and teeth, and it can spit a corrosive acid.

Guard.Name: Guard
Guard.Description: A guard is a member of a city's or town's law enforcement. They are typically armed with a sword and shield, and they are trained in basic combat.

Harpy.Name: Harpy
Harpy.Description: A harpy is a winged creature that is often found in mountains and forests. It has the body of a woman and the head and wings of an eagle.

Hell Hound.Name: Hell Hound
Hell Hound.Description: A hell hound is a demonic creature that is often found in the service of evil creatures. It has the body of a dog and the head of a wolf.

Hobgoblin.Name: Hobgoblin
Hobgoblin.Description: A hobgoblin is a large, humanoid creature that is often found in the service of evil creatures. They are typically strong and aggressive, and they are skilled in combat.

Homunculus.Name: Homunculus
Homunculus.Description: A homunculus is a small, magical creature that is often created by a wizard or sorcerer. It is typically used as a servant or a spy.

Ice Troll.Name: Ice Troll
Ice Troll.Description: An ice troll is a large, hulking creature that is often found in cold climates. It is typically strong and aggressive, and it is resistant to cold damage.

Kobold.Name: Kobold
Kobold.Description: A kobold is a small, reptilian creature that is often found in dungeons and caves. They are typically cowardly and treacherous, but they can be dangerous if they are underestimated.

Lich.Name: Lich
Lich.Description: A lich is an undead creature that has achieved immortality through dark magic. They are typically powerful spellcasters, and they are feared by all who know them.

Medusa.Name: Medusa
Medusa.Description: A medusa is a female monster with snakes for hair. Anyone who looks into her eyes is turned to stone.

Minotaur.Name: Minotaur
Minotaur.Description: A minotaur is a large, bull-headed creature that is often found in dungeons and caves. They are typically strong and aggressive, and they are skilled in combat.

Aarakocra.Name: Aarakocra
Aarakocra.Description: Aarakocra are bird-like humanoids that live in the desert. They are typically peaceful and nomadic, and they are skilled in flight.

Basilisk.Name: Basilisk
Basilisk.Description: A basilisk is a large, reptilian creature that is often found in the desert. It has the ability to turn its victims to stone with its gaze.

Camel.Name: Camel
Camel.Description: A camel is a large, humped mammal that is often found in the desert. It is typically docile and patient, and it is known for its ability to withstand harsh conditions.

Dunestrider.Name: Dunestrider
Dunestrider.Description: A dunestrider is a large, insectoid creature that is often found in the desert. It is typically aggressive and territorial, and it is skilled in combat.

Efreeti.Name: Efreeti
Efreeti.Description: An efreeti is a powerful genie that is often found in the desert. They are typically arrogant and cruel, and they are skilled in magic.

Gnome.Name: Gnome
Gnome.Description: A gnome is a small, humanoid creature that is often found in the desert. They are typically curious and inventive, and they are skilled in magic.
